description: Schema to turn ELViS' specimen status into digital objects

@id.description: The unique identifier of the status, follows the Digital Object Identifier (DOI) standard

requestID.description: The unique identifier of the project, follows the Digital Object Identifier (DOI) standard. This links the specimen status to a specific project.

status.description: The status of the specimen corresponding to that digital object. By default,the specimen is Available.
enum: Someone is currenly visiting the specimen on site

projectTitle.description: Title of the project associated with the specimen status

items.description: Host institution(s) associated with the project

hostInstitutions.description: List of host institutions related to the project affecting the specimen.

requestDate.description: Date of the project request affecting the specimen.

startDate.description: Start date of the project affecting the specimen.

endDate.description: End date of the project affecting the specimen.
